entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas this weekend to raise money to pay for her residency. Theyâ€™re $15 per plate. Pickup is available in Denver and Boulder. Order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

entry.title: Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Tania is selling enchiladas rojas con queso this weekend to raise money for her residency application. She moved to the US with her mother as a child and is a DACA recipient, which has allowed her to pursue education, work, and have more stability with her family. But DACA doesnâ€™t provide a pathway to citizenship, and itâ€™s protection, by nature, is temporary. Securing her residency will give Tania and her family more stability. You can support her in that process by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

entry.title: Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Boulder, Colorado.

Jeanette & Edna are making burritos next weekend! All of the money raised will go toward our emergency fund in case someone is detained or in immediate need of a lawyer. You can support by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

Photo by @traeben1717, who is working alongside several folks to create a documentary about the #SolidarityMeals program.
Director: Tyler Borkowski @little_bork_man
Producer: Chloe Halvorson @uunga.bunga...
Director of Photography: Trae Beneck @traeben1717
Lead Journalist: Karen Manley @karennmanley
Translator: Luis Castro Ortega

Please donate what you can Vemo @Sanctuary-4-All. entry.title: Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend!...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Edna is selling flautas & tacos dorados next weekend! Sheâ€™s raising money to hire a lawyer for her sonâ€™s immigration case once it gets closer to his court date. You can support here: https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Unlike in criminal proceedings, people in immigration court have no right to a lawyer, and so anyone who cannot afford one must represent themselves. There are some local stopgap programs, such as the Rocky Mountain Immigrant Advocacy Network, which provides ...free legal services to people in immigrant detention, and the Denver Immigrant Legal Services Fund, which pays immigration attorneys to represent people who would otherwise be unable to obtain a lawyer (disappointingly, the Aurora City Council recently voted not to establish a similar immigrant legal defense fund). Our goal is to create a world where immigration courts donâ€™t exist at all, but while theyâ€™re here, we will demand for and help fund legal representation for everyone we can.

#solidaritymeals #sanctuary4all #abolishice #abolishprisons #mutualaid

See More

entry.title: We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

We are postponing pickups for solidarity meals due to inclement weather until next saturday 3/20. We are sorry for the inconvenience but we want you all to stay safe and off the roads! We are messaging everyone individually to ensure you are able to collect next Saturday and if not we will do our best to accommodate! Thank you for all of your support and stay warm!
